alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; Richland (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:25AM CDT until April 05 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR ASHLEY COUNTY...MOREHOUSE AND NORTH CENTRAL RICHLAND PARISHES... At 424 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hamburg to Bastrop, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Snyder and Galion around 435 AM CDT. Portland, Montrose and Parkdale around 445 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bonita, Collinston, Mer Rouge and Oak Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
